svg.title: Direction A: "Commodore Heritage" — Character Grid
svg.text: Direction A: "Commodore Heritage" — Rounded, Organic, PETSCII-Inspired
8×16 pixel characters · 4× zoom · Soft edges, 1px rounded corners where possible
Key traits: Rounded box corners · Organic card suits · Smooth diagonals · Friendly, playful weight
Total unique characters shown: 40 (letters, digits, box drawing, blocks, shading, arrows, symbols, PETSCII specials)
